Instruction: Peel and devein the shrimp, leaving tails intact.
Cut the passion fruit in half and scoop out the pulp into a bowl.
Juice the lime and add it to the bowl with passion fruit pulp.
Add honey, minced garlic, salt, and black pepper to the bowl, and whisk to combine.
Marinate the shrimp in the passion fruit mixture for about 15-20 minutes.
Preheat a grill or grill pan over medium-high heat (around 375Â°F).
Thread the shrimp onto skewers and grill for 2-3 minutes per side, or until cooked through and slightly charred.
Brush the shrimp with any remaining passion fruit glaze while grilling.
Remove the shrimp skewers from the grill and serve hot as a tangy and flavorful side dish.
